data.why:
Module(s) to read and write DTA disks for electronic banking (DTA
    means 'Datentraegeraustausch'; there are sets of data formats for
    various data processing media to exchange direct debit and bank
    transfer order via disk or online between customer and bank, in
    Germany :)

    Module would help to read and generate 3,5" disk / online format
    for direct debit and bank transfer, e.g. one could generate such
    files from an online shop and read direct debit orders with software
    like StarMoney.
